name: Skate it (itch)
description:
Developed by Jed Klika

Controls  Left click to increase speed, Right Click to Jump, Move the mouse to guide the direction

Flip tricks F and WADS example F and D  for Kick Flip

Grab Tricks C and WADS  Example C and D for Indy

Rail Tricks

C =Smith

F= Crooked

Play in full screen

To Exit the Game press the window key and close it from the task bar

Please enjoy
